Class CliController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.cli.CliController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewControllerVisitor, ViewModelVisitor, ViewVisitor, UIInterface

extends java.lang.Object
implements UIInterface, ViewVisitor, ViewControllerVisitor, ViewModelVisitor
    CLI Event handler.

    Matteo Formentin

        public void visit(StartPlayerTurn event)
        Method to handle the start of the turn

        maybe should receive and process some attribute for able/disable some options for example: when you place one die the next event from the controller set the event's boolean insert die to false and the menu won't show this option

        Specified by:
        visit in interface ViewControllerVisitor
        Parameters:
        event - of type startPlayer
